#summary Installation instructions.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

  # [http://code.google.com/p/bitly/downloads/detail?name=bitly-0.2b.zip Download]
  # Unzip into web server root directory.
  # Edit `config.php`.
  # Edit `example.html` header to point to your jQuery location
  # It's done. Open `http://your-server/bitly/example.html` in your web browser.
